author: stephtr
body:
# Steps to reproduce

```powershell
echo Test > $env:APPDATA\test.txt
dir $env:APPDATA\test.txt
cmd /c dir $env:APPDATA\test.txt
```

# Expected behavior

`dir` should display the created file, `cmd` too.

# Actual behavior

According to `dir` the file exists, but `cmd` shows that it doesn't. This is due to writes to AppData folders are redirected in UWP packages.

# Environment data

<!-- provide the output of $PSVersionTable -->

